thread.title: Demi Lovato and John Legend Set to Perform at Hillary Clinton's Birthday Party
thread.title_full: Demi Lovato and John Legend Set to Perform at Hillary Clinton's Birthday Party

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Demi Lovato and John Legend Set to Perform at Hillary Clinton's Birthday Party
text:
Comments The party, also serving as a campaign fundraiser, is scheduled to take place in NYC on October 25, a day before the presidential candidate is turning 68. 
Hillary Clinton is throwing herself a party to celebrate her upcoming birthday. The presidential hopeful, who's turning 68 on October 26, has enlisted Demi Lovato and John Legend to perform at the bash, which will also serve as a campaign fundraiser. According to the announcement on her website, the event is scheduled to take place on Sunday, October 25 at New York City's Hilton Midtown Manhattan. An invitation obtained by PEOPLE said that attendees might have a chance to see Clinton dancing at the bash. "Some women don't like to discuss their ages, but I think that on your birthday, you should live it up!" Clinton wrote on the invitation as quoted by the news outlet. "This year, I'm excited to celebrate the fact that I'm running to be the youngest woman ever to be President of the United States." Tickets are on sale from $250 to $2700 through Clinton's website .
